nodes.text: Nichos Panib was a pilot who joined the Rebel Alliance. Prior to the Battle of Hoth, he attended Princess Leia's pilot briefing before heading to his fighter and flying as Green Four during the battle. A noble from Virujansi, Panib painted his helmet to match that of Garven Dreis, an old friend of his mother's family.
Panib was first identified in "Rogues Gallery: Clearance for Immediate Launch" in Star Wars Insider 146. His helmet is visible in The Empire Strikes Back.

Rece's helmet prop was originally used by Garven Dreis in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, and later by an unknown pilot in Return of the Jedi. The prop was seen again in the video game Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire, worn by Ina Rece.
